title: Theodore Roosevelt Island: Public Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Public Transportation              Public Transportation       BikeShare Bicycles from Capital Bike Share can be picked up and returned at a station in Rosslyn near the island.      Bus and Rail The Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (Metrorail) and Arlington Transit serve the island.      Airports Washington Reagan National Airport is four miles from the park. It is located on a Metrorail line that goes to the station nearest the island. Baltimore Washington International Airport (to the north) and Dulles International Airport (to the west) are both within 50 miles of the island.
